pages.text: Letting a full block of Liquid Crystal absorb the immense heat of Lava resulted in this.$(br)Almost feels like a Magma Block, albeit way hotter.

Crushing $(thing)Blazing Crystal$() with an Anvil yields this burning hot powder, which almost sets your hand in flames by holding it. Crushing $(thing)Magma Blocks$() seems to work, too, albeit with much less yield.
As Water tried to flow to a full block of Liquid Crystal the crystal turned solid.$(br)Since even a light touch is enough to give you a cold shiver, you called it Frostbite Crystal

Crushing $(thing)Frostbite Crystal$() with an Anvil yields this ice cold powder, which almost makes your hand freeze just by holding it. Crushing $(thing)Ice$() seems to work, too, albeit with much less yield.
